abstract: Vivien Schweitzer reviews concert of Mozart and Debussy works, performed by New York Philharmonic and featuring conductor Lorin Maazel, at Avery Fisher Hall.
snippet: With Lorin Maazel, conducting the New York Philharmonic for the first time since his departure as music director in 2009, it was business as usual.
lead_paragraph: With Lorin Maazel, conducting the New York Philharmonic for the first time since his departure as music director in 2009, it was business as usual.

headline.seo: New York Philharmonic at Avery Fisher Hall - Review
